Name: Double Jump
Description: Allows the player to jump a second time in mid-air.

Name: Wall Climb
Description: Enables the player to climb walls.

Name: Dash
Description: Quickly moves the player in a chosen direction.

Name: Grapple Hook
Description: Lets the player grapple to surfaces.

Name: Invisibility
Description: Makes the player invisible for a short time.

Name: Shield
Description: Creates a protective shield around the player.

Name: Time Slow
Description: Slows time for everything but the player.

Name: Heal
Description: Restores a portion of player health over time.
